name: @atlaskit/reduced-ui-pack
description: CSS classes which provide styling for a reduced number of Atlaskit components.
author: Atlassian Pty Ltd

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp src/bundle.css dist/bundle.css && cp src/icons-sprite.svg dist/icons-sprite.svg
scripts.update: lessc src/index.less src/bundle.css && yarn run sprite
